AIUT Generation
=============

The AIUT Tool automates integration and unit testing for software applications,
 ensuring reliability and saving time for developers.

Installation
------------
creating a virtual environment in windows:
1. first create a folder in your windows machine
   1. mkdir folder--name
2. navigate to that folder you created in your terminal and open it and run the below commands
   1. python -m venv myenv
   2. myenv\Scripts\activate
3. now run the below command to install the AIUT Tool
   1. pip install ver17==0.1
Usage
-----
1. Run the application: run the app just by giving command in the terminal
   1. ver17
follow the documentation file on how to use the application.
